title: Watermelon salad
intro: A refreshing sweet and savory salad for hot summer days.

insSteps: Peel and dice the watermelon, add it to a big salad bowl. Make sure to remove as many seeds from the watermelon as possible.
Dice the feta and add to the bowl.
Cut the fresh mint leaves into the salad and mix everything.
Keep in the fridge before serving.
